entry.title: Chubby, Tattooed, Bearded, Awesome Mug
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type:
Price: 15.00

This ain't no vinyl printed mug.  We've used the longest lasting, never wear away, dishwasher safe, daily use sublimation method to brand these mugs with great beard loving sayings.

Blacked out 11 oz mugs with inner color matching the handle, they come with a single use tea or coffee so you can use it right away.

*tested for dishwasher and daily use.

entry.title: The Beard Poncho - Covid-19 Masks - Grey Arrows
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type:
Price: 15.00

It looks like masks, social distancing and precautionary safety measures are going to be around for a while as the world fights Covid-19.  Most masks available on the market today leave a pretty bad crease in the beard once you take it off and just aren't that comfortable to wear.

We partnered up with a local mask maker and after a few prototypes and some trial and error, the Beard Poncho was born.  Reversible, 100% cotton, with adjustable ear straps and wire in the nose area make this a great fitting, comfortable alternative to the other masks available while still keeping you and others safe, and the best part, no beard crease.

Available in a number of styles, we are confident you and your beard will love the Beard Poncho.  Scroll through the photos to see the different styles.

If this is the only item on your order, shipping is only $5 within Canada and the USA.

100% Cotton.  Hand wash in cold water.  Hang to dry.

Beard Poncho by the nature of the product and the fact that we are in the midst of the Covid-19 Pandemic are not refundable or returnable.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

entry.title: Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Topher's Beard + Soap Co.
Type: Gift Card
Price: 10.00 - 100.00 (4 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a Topher's Beard + Soap Co. gift card.

Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.
